org.pepstock.charba.client.data

Class PolarAreaDataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.JavaScriptObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.data.Dataset
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.data.PolarAreaDataset

  • public class PolarAreaDataset
extends Dataset
    The polar area chart allows a number of properties to be specified for each dataset. These are used to set display properties for a specific dataset.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
